Section.Catchline: Home care for the elderly; definitions.

Subsection.Text: “Department” means the Department of Elderly Affairs.
“Elderly person” means any person 60 years of age or over who is currently a resident of this state and has an intent to remain in this state.

“Home care for the elderly” means a full-time family-type living arrangement, in a private home, under which a person or group of persons provides, on a nonprofit basis, basic services of maintenance and supervision, and any necessary specialized services as may be needed, for three or fewer elderly persons.
